resources.string:
Gestures 
All basic gestures are supported: 

Pan 

Zoom 

Fling 

Double tap (with smooth animation) 

Quick scale (double tap & swipe) 

Rotation 

Additional features 

Elastic overzoom above min or max levels 

Elastic overscroll 

Restricting rotation by 90° 

… and much more, see next examples 

Settings 
All features above are configurable, plus: 

Max zoom level 

Double tap zoom level 

Image gravity (CENTER by default) 

Fit method (INSIDE by default) 

Animations duration 

Disable all gestures 

Disable bounds restrictions 

… and more 

Hint: you can use toolbar menu to change some of the setting on the fly in this and other examples in the app. 

Listeners 
Both OnClickListener and OnLongClickListener are supported, you can also set OnGestureListener to listen for additional events and their locations.

By default GestureImageView will only allow ViewPager scrolling if it is zoomed out to a min zoom. 

But it is also possible to enable seamless ViewPager integration with next features: 


Image panning smoothly turns into ViewPager flipping and vise versa 


ViewPager flipping is made harder when image is zoomed in, to prevent accidental page flips when panning zoomed image
